title: Pod Save the Planet with Al Gore
description: Former Vice President Al Gore talks with Jon, Jon, and Tommy about his new movie Inconvenient Sequel: Truth to Power. Lovett also made some jokes.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
